类型: Size: MediumColor: Black and White - Cropped Womens Varsity Jacket
评论详情: I recently got the Decrum Cropped Varsity Jacket, and it's a perfect fit. I usually opt for a size small, but this time, I wanted a slightly bigger, cropped look. I went with my gut and got a medium, and I couldn't be happier. The fit is exactly what I envisioned, and it proves that there's no wrong or right size – it's all about personal preference. So, whether you want it snug or roomy, this jacket allows you to go crazy and rock your style. The classic varsity design is timeless, and the quality, from stitching to snap closures, is exceptional and went perfect with my backpack.This jacket is a hit, a jackpot in the realm of classic, fun varsity styles. The vintage vibe, accentuated by the attractive, soft material and retro color scheme, makes it a neck breaker. The jacket's durability exceeded expectations, and even when a button needed fixing, it was a simple solution. The Decrum Cropped Varsity Jacket is a fantastic addition, offering comfort, style, and the option to personalize it with patches if you desire. It's a winner in every sense!
